1.content: To start, which universe are we starting in?
1.title: Choose Your Universe

1111.content: Who is the lucky expanding pony?
1111.title: One of the Mane 6

11111.content: Which of the 3 shall grow?
11111.title: Twilight, Rarity, or Rainbow Dash?

111112.author_name: Just here for the poke story
111112.content:
Rarity woke up,, immediately sensing something was strange. She couldn't put her hoof on it, but something was.. off.. For some reason her pillow she was resting on seemed smaller and she was higher up down. She rolled over, trying to repostion herself, but nothing felt right. Rarity took a few seconds to ponder this then shook her head.

“I'm sure its nothing.” She said, still breathing quicker than normal.

Rarity showered then wrapped her dressing gown and towel around her, noticing these were tighter than normal, to the point where she didn't bother doing it up.

She grimaced down at herself.

“Have I put on weight? I guess its time to start that diet.” She shuddered, pulling her robe up, hoping to make it less tight around her legs and felt her stomach, expecting to find some extra pudge, but didn't notice anything. “Hmm.. how strange.” Rarity stared a few seconds longer, giving herself another quick scan, hoping to find the extra weight, but couldn't see anything.

Eventually she gave up and headed into the kitchen, making breakfast for herself and Sweetie Belle. She wondered why the counter seemed lower down, but trying to push those strange thoughts away. Prehaps she hadn't fully woken up yet.

Sweetie Belle followed in a little later. She stared vacantly at Rarity, as she was want to do sometimes. Rarity took no notice until Sweetie Belle had been staring at her for entirely too long a time.

“Sweetie Belle what is it?” Rarity's teeth clenched as she tried to sound like she wasn't bothered.

“Rarity... Did you get taller?”

Rarity looked over her shoulder, still preparing breakfast.

“Don't be silly Sweetie Belle, grown up ponies like me can't-”

She stopped as Sweetie Belle approached, immediately noticing that she was smaller in relation to her own height. The kitchen was smaller as well, and there was something strange about the bathroom... the bit dropped.

“I am taller!” Rarity shrieked.

Sweetie belle titled her head.

“But you said-”

“I know that!" Rarity cut her off, then took several quick breaths. "I don't know how it happened!" Rarity's eyes widened and her breath quickened. "AHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!"

Sweetie Belle tilted her head.

"It's just a few inches, whats the big deal?"

"I'm going to have to resize all my dresses!"

Sweetie Belle huffed.

"THAT's what you're worried about?"
111112.title: I should stop, I should really stop

11112.content: Alright, then who shall it be then?
11112.title: Fluttershy, Applejack or Pinkie Pie?

1112.content: How about one of these?
1112.title: A backround pony

choices: He finds he can vore ponies
11122.title: Bigger Button

111222.content:
"Come on Button, you can do it," Rumble cheered.

"Ok, here I go," Button Mash said as he opened his mouth as wide as he could and shoved the orange in. He'd always been able to swallow things in one bite most ponies couldn't, but Rumble's dare was the biggest yet. Slowly he felt the fruit slide down his throat and into his stomach. "Done! You owe me five bits," he smiled.

Rumble huffed as he hoofed over the coins. "Just you wait, I'll find something too big even for your big mouth."

"I doubt it," Button smirked. "I bet I could even swallow your head."

Rumble laughed. "Yeah right, I'd give twenty bits if that were possible."

"Let's do it then," Button said

"Seriously?" Rumble asked in disbelief. Button just stared at him. "Hey, if you wanna lose the bits," Rumble said, still giggling.

Button stood over Rumble and opened his mouth wide. His lips swapped around Rumble's forehead, but he couldn't open any wider. He pushed with all his might but all that happened was Rumble fell to his belly. "Looks like you owe ME twenty bits," he sad.

Button kept pushing, his mind filled with thoughts of what it could feel like to have Rumble's head in his mouth, struggling as he tried desperately to escape. As he imagined a strong tingle rushed up his back and into his head. Slowly he felt his jaws widen until Rumble's head slipped inside. A tide of pleasure raced down his spine. He was doing it! He'd actually fit the colt's head into his mouth.

"You actually did it," Rumble mumbled, his voice muffled by Button's cheeks. "Now let me out."

Button was lost in the sensations of swallowing Rumble's head. His tongue licked all over the colt's face, every inch pleasuring his taste buds. Without thinking he gulped, and his friend's neck vanished inside his jaws. Everything faded away except for the feeling of Rumble in his mouth. He quickly gulped down the pegasus's chest and stomach. Next came his crotch, and Button moaned at the tastes there. He licked all over Rumble's balls, his sheath and even his tailhole. He felt Rumble's cock emerge and he attacked it with his tongue, licking and sucking until he tasted a sweet but salty liquid fill his mouth. Another strong swallow sent the last of his friend down into his stomach.

Slowly Button came down from his pleasure high and looked down at his massive stomach, swollen with the body of another pony. "Wow, I actually ate him! Wait, I ate him! Friends aren't food?" As his mind raced, Button...
111222.title: He finds he can vore ponies

1112222.content:
"Well, he's already in there, probably be pretty hard to get him out," Button figured. As he sat there he felt a surge of heat in his stomach, and as he watched the bulge of Rumble started to shrink. After nearly a minute Button's stomach was back to normal ,but the warmth spread to his whole body and before his eyes the colt saw himself growing. His hooves moved over the grass and his rump spread over the ground until he was over four feel tall, nearly as big as Mrs. Cheerilee.

"Holy moly," Button smiled as he stood up. "I look good." Looking around the park, he didn't see any other ponies nearby. "Whew, nopony saw that. But what should I do now?"
1112222.title: Decides to digest him

11123.content:
"All right now Twist, add the sugar," Bon-Bon instructed.

"Got it," Twist smiled, carefully emptying a small bag of white granules into the mixing bowl. "What'th the rethipie?" She asked.

"Well, this is a new kind of sugar that just came out," Bon-Bon grinned. "It's supposed to always leave you wanting more, so I thought I'd add it to my classic Cinnamon Clusters. If they sell good enough I may just switch my supplier."

Once the cookies were baked and cooling, Twist dusted the flour off her mane. She was just about to taste test one of the snacks when the door was thrown open and Lyra barged in. "Bonny, I need your help!"

"I'm baking Lyra, it can wait," Bon-Bon said with a tone of practiced patience.

"But it's an emergency! I finally caught a human in one of my traps and I need a witness!"

"Lyra, humans aren't..." The earth pony trailed off. "Twist, I have to go rescue whatever poor pony Lyra's trapped this time. Can you watch the shop for just a few minutes?"

"Thure thing," Twist replied. Once the adults had gone, Twist went back to eyeing the cookies. "Maybe one, I gonna thee what they tathte like." Taking a large bite, Twist's eyes widened. "Thith ith great!" She wolfed down the rest of the treat, and as she swallowed the last bite a warm feeling grew in her stomach. "Maybe one more." That one became two, then three, and before Twist knew it the baking tray was empty. "Oh no, I ate them all! What am I gonna do!"

As she panicked, Twist failed to notice that she was slowly growing, rising an inch taller, then two and then three. Her tummy rumbled, and without realizing it she began grabbing other treats and gulping them down. Cookies, cupcakes and pastries all were packed away inside her.

After several minutes Twist finally snapped out of it. "Hey, am I taller?" She asked herself. Looking down, she was shocked to see that she had grown nearly an entire foot taller. "How could thith have happened?" Another rumble brought Twist's attention to the hunger in her gut. "Gotta eat," she said, shoveling more food into her mouth, whole cakes meeting their end between her lips. Her growth continued slowly and steadily, and by the time her belly was full the filly stood nearly four feet tall. "Bon-Bon will be mad when she thees everything I ate."

Before she could come up with an explanation for Bon-Bon, a near roar came from her tummy, causing Twist to double over. "Need more food!" She gasped, throwing anything her growing hooves could reach into her mouth. After nearly ten minutes of frantic eating, every scrap of food in the bakery was gone, and Twist sank to the ground. "Ahhh, better," she sighed. The warm feeling in her stomach was building, the heat increasing until finally....
11123.title: Twist

111231.content:
The sweets shop seemed to be collapsing around Twist as her size rapidly increased, going from four feet to ten in less than a minute. Her rump crashed through a display case as her glassed fell to the floor, causing things to become slightly blurry. The heat in her stomach reached out to fill her entire body as she grew. "Ooohh, thith fees tho good!" She moaned, every inch of height sending shockwaves of pleasure surging through her body.

Her head hit the ceiling as she reached fifteen feet, sending plaster bits raining down. Her growing body was rapidly running out of space to fill. "Bon-Bon won't like this," she said, not able to keep a small grin off of her face as she imagined what was going to come next. Her hooves were already breaking through the storefront, and her butt spread over the back wall, sending cracks radiating out.

With a grunt of effort, Twist stood up, her head breaking through the roof as the rest of her body burst from the disintegrating shop. Shaking the debris from her mane, she looked around, marveling as her size. She was at least twenty feet tall, her head easily able to see over the roofs of the buildings around her. Ponies looked up in confusion and fear at the massive filly in their midst. "Hey everypony," she smiled. "I had a little to much to eat, hehe."

A groan came from her stomach, and Twist grabbed at her middle. "Need more food, more!" She grimaced, looking around before....
111231.title: She grows through the roof

1113.content: There are plenty of fillies in Ponyville that could get an unexpected growing spurt. Maybe a member of the CMC? They're usually all equals, so it could be interesting to see what happens when one has power over the others. Or maybe Diamond Tiara or Silver Spoon?
1113.title: Fillies

11131.content: Scenario A - Applebloom and Sweetie Belle go on an adventure in the Everfree, only for Applebloom to discover an ancient secret that makes her grow uncontrollably.
11131.title: One of the CMC

choices: A village in the middle of the Everfree!
111311.content:
“Ugh… have we made it to the treasure yet?” Sweetie Belle groaned as she followed Applebloom through the fields, her legs aching from the miles and miles of walking in the intense heat.

“Oh, quit your complainin’, lazy-pants,” Applebloom replied, playfully, over her shoulder. “The adventure isn’t the destination, it’s the journey! So just enjoy it.” Sweetie Belle sighed as she pressed on through her exhaustion, not wanting to ruin their adventure.

Most of the foals in her class were obsessed with the idea of growing up, wearing signs of maturity like a cutie mark or an apprenticeship like badges of pride. Sweetie Belle wasn’t as enthused. It seems like the closer she comes to adulthood, the more everything she enjoys in life gets lost in the shuffle. Now that she has her cutie mark, it is considered time for her to take her next step in life and decide on a craft. It is vital she choose her life’s career as early as possible, or so she’s told, because it takes decades to become a master in any craft, and thus she needs to start an apprenticeship somewhere ASAP. Rarity constantly ushered Sweetie Belle between cutie mark interpreters and counselors, who only served to instill in her that dreadful fear that any wrong decision she made could ruin her entire future. She always feels alone, like nopony understands what she’s going through.

Except with Applebloom. Applebloom felt like the only pony she could really relax and be honest with. Every once in awhile, Sweetie Belle would complain about all her stress and problems, and Applebloom would listen. She wouldn’t say anything, or give any suggestions. She would just listen, silently, and that’s all that Sweetie Belle needed. Applebloom was the one who came up with the idea of these ‘adventures’, after all. Ever since the CMC first met, Applebloom would occasionally call for an adventure, and they would rush off somewhere new and unexplored, wearing nothing but capes and homemade origami tricorne hats, and spend the day playing games and pretending to uncover lost treasures until the sun went down. It was something they haven’t done in… forever, it feels like.

So far, the places they were having the ‘adventure’ were pretty boring; just wandering along the fields at the edge of Ponyville, where Fluttershy tends to do her gardening. But Sweetie didn’t get bored, because she enjoyed rambling with her friend about unrelated topics. “You ever wonder what would happen if all of Fluttershy’s animals just went crazy one day?” Applebloom thought out loud. She tended to guide the conversation, which Sweetie never minded, because Applebloom tended to be more a more interesting speaker anyway. “I mean, it wouldn’t be too hard for them to take over, right? Her pet bear looks like he could swallow her in one bite!”

“Hasn’t Fluttershy scared off a dragon before?” Sweetie Belle noted. “She probably could handle a bear.”

“Yeah, her friends say she did, but do you really think it happened?” Applebloom laughed, with an almost conspiratorial tone. “I mean, could you imagine Fluttershy scaring anything? She’s too nice.”

“So you think they’re lying?” Sweetie Belle asked.

“Oh, no! Even Applejack says it happened, and my sis would never lie about anything!” Applebloom shrugged off the notion. “But maybe the dragon got scared off by something else? Maybe they just misunderstood what happened?”

Sweetie Belle pondered it. “I like to imagine that it was just a particularly cowardly dragon,” she decides. “I mean, stranger things have happened.”

“Ehhh. Maybe…” Applebloom shrugged. “So what’s been happening with the, uh, apprenticeship?” Applebloom didn’t have to worry about her future like Sweetie Belle did, as her career had already been decided for her just by virtue of her being a member of the Apple family. Scootaloo didn’t have to worry about it either, since she couldn’t fly yet and wasn’t considered ‘ready’. All of her other classmates had already gotten apprenticeships, too… damn! Sweetie Belle just wished she could be as confident as Applebloom was.

“Nothing new,” she sighs. “My counsellors keep telling me that whatever’s going to happen is my destiny, anyway. So if my destiny is to fail, I’m doomed to fail no matter what I do. I guess that’s supposed to be comforting.” Destiny was a revered concept in Equestria, particularly in the journey to adulthood. It is believed that the Stars plan out everypony’s destiny when they are born. Only by following the plan of the Stars can order be maintained in Equestria… or so she has been told. But Sweetie Belle isn’t as enthusiastic about the idea of destiny as most ponies were. She wasn’t even sure if it was real.

“Hmm… that sucks,” Applebloom says simply, in that sympathetic, comforting way she always does. “Hey, hey. We’ve made it to the fun part!” Applebloom suddenly declares enthusiastically, tugging at Sweetie Belle’s hoof.

“What? What are you talking about?” Sweetie Belle asks as she follows the enthusiastic foal deeper into the wilderness.

“The treasure I was talking about is in there,” Applebloom says, standing at the edge of the Everfree forest and pointing into the foliage. The wind blowed through the trees, ominously, as they stared into the darkness.

“Huh? Are you joking?” Sweetie Belle balks at the suggestion. “We’re not supposed to go into the Everfree! It’s too dangerous!”

“Oh, no, it’s just a few feet in. It’s not in any of the dangerous parts,” Applebloom reassures the other foal. “Trust me, I played with this thing all day yesterday. You’re going to love it.” Applebloom walks confidently into the underbrush, and Sweetie Belle hesitantly follows. Everything was different in the Everfree, as if the rules of reality themselves change. Gravity becomes stronger and it becomes harder to walk, and even the areas that were exposed to sunlight seemed darker than normal, as if she was wearing sunglasses. The trees look unusually haggard and twisted, like a thousand bony fingers reaching up towards the sky. At any time of day, Sweetie Belle found the forest creepy. But she didn’t want to come off as a coward and ruin the fun, especially after they’ve already come all the way here. Applebloom was always confident. Why couldn’t Sweetie Belle be?

Eventually, they found what they were looking for; a mine cart! They approached to see it was still attached to ancient railroad tracks running through the forest, overgrown with vines and weeds. “Whoa...” Sweetie Belle says, surprised. “Does this thing still work?”

“Why don’t you climb in and find out?” Applebloom dares, flashing her friend a mischevious look. Sweetie Belle responded with as much confidence as she can muster, climbing into the mine cart with no visible hesitation. If Applebloom can be brave, so can I, she thought to herself. “Alright, hang on!” Applebloom warns, and starts pushing against the side of the mine cart. Applebloom pushes with all her might, but can’t seem to make it budge for a few seconds; until finally, the cart starts picking up momentum. The second it started moving, Applebloom hopped into the mine cart alongside Sweetie Belle, and the two of them went careening down a hill.

“Whoa!” Sweetie Belle’s brave facade drops, and she screams in shock as the cart suddenly starts flying through the forest. Applejack giggles at her outburst, causing Sweetie Belle to blush in embarrassment and punch her lightly in the shoulder. “Hey! Warn me next time you’re going to do something crazy like that!” She says, angrily. Soon, the two foals scoot around and get comfortable in the cart, and they are able to sit back and enjoy the view of the scenery rolling by as the cart rolled easily up and down hills. Sweetie Belle can’t help but laugh at how surprisingly fun the cart ride was, and just how fast they were going in such an ancient vehicle. “Whoa…” She says again, this time in a whisper to herself.

“What did I tell ya? Is this awesome or what?” Applebloom smiles, and Sweetie Belle smiles back. There isn’t much room in the cart, so the two friends are pretty much pressed together, causing Sweetie Belle to suppress a blush. Something about being close to Applebloom caused her heart to flutter sometimes, a feeling she could never explain.

“Umm… we’re going a bit deep into the forest, aren't we?” She says, trying to distract herself. As they rolled the cart deeper into the Everfree, the beautiful fields that used to be rolling by were long past, and all they had left to look at was the eery, dark forest. She noticed that she couldn’t hear anything, either; not even any birds chirping. Only the squeaking of the cart and the ominous sound of wind sweeping through the leaves.

“Yeah, but when we reach the end of the tracks,we can just push the cart in the other direction and ride back to Ponyville. No big deal,” Applebloom shrugged it off, fearless as ever. Sweetie Belle sighed and remained silent, not wanting to look like the coward. As the cart ride continued and they were sent deeper into the forest, Sweetie Belle only grew more anxious, though having Applebloom by her side comforted her a bit. Eventually, just when she thought the tracks would never end, Sweetie Belle saw a landmark in the distance.
111311.title: Fillies in the Everfree

1113112.content:
It was a Village but it was seemingly abandoned.
As they approached Apple-Bloom spotted an old looking chalice of sorts with odd writing inside some stone structure with a roof and steps.
There was a weathered sign with odd writing.


She went up to it and saw what looked like just water in it.
Parched Apple-Bloom drank every last drop.


Little did they know they were being watched.

"Ah that hit the spot! I was parched as can be! Now let's get out of this strange place


The 2 watching the ponies conversed.

"That was a short and disastrous visit" said the 1st stranger.


"Disaster is an understatement. That young pony drank it all. She's going to quite big. I dare say neither is nor those who know her can fathom the results to come. Who'd have thought the 1 time in 125 years we let our guard down we'd get the 1st visiting centuries and they'd so casually drink the forbidden elixir" said the 2nd stranger.
1113112.title: A village in the middle of the Everfree!

111312.content:
Which
One
Of the CMC?
111312.title: Which of the CMC?

1113122.content:
How shall Sweetie grow?

1) She practices a spell she learned in one of Twilight's books she borrowed.

2) She eats something she shouldn't have that she finds in the woods.
1113122.title: Sweetie Bell

11131221.content:
Sweetie Bell practically galloped up the stairs to her room, her saddlebags nearly falling from her hips as she kicked the door shut behind her. Pulling a book from her bag, she opened it to the page she'd marked earlier. "Ok, let's do this," she smiled. Twilight had told her to only look at spells in the book's first chapter, but her curiosity had gotten the better of her. "Let's see, teleporting, transmuting...aha! Visions to reality, how to make your dreams manifest."

Only crumpling the page slightly as she read through the spell's description, Sweetie channeled her magic, a dim green glow engulfing her body. "Vision to world, power to will, a pony's...growth to make dreams become real!" There was a flash as the unicorn was thrown back against her thankfully soft bed. Looking around, Sweetie saw that....
11131221.title: Growth spell

111312211.content:
Aside from a tendril of smoke rising from the book nothing happened. "Aww, guess Twilight was right, maybe I do need more practice," Sweetie Belle sighed.

The next few hours passed uneventfully, and after dinner Sweetie studied the spell book until the sun went down, trying to find where she'd gone wrong.

"Sweetie Belle, time for bed," Rarity poked her head in Sweetie's room.

"Ok Rarity," the younger unicorn replied. Closing the book, she hopped up into her bed. Extinguishing the light with a flick of magic, she closed her eyes and quickly drifted off to sleep.

As the light of Luna's moon slowly moved across the floor and shone down on the bed, Sweetie's body glowed a bright green for several seconds. She groaned and shifted around before relaxing, the glow fading but in its place something else was happening. The sheets began rising further with each of Sweetie's breaths and her shoulders poked out into the open air as Sweetie Belle began to grow. Even as more and more of the bed was taken up with her growing form the foal didn't stir.

After a minute her rear hooved slipped out into the open and hung over the edge of the bed as her head struck the headboard. With the bed creaking under her weight Sweetie....
111312211.title: Nothing had happened (grows later)

choices: Her growth sped up before she got out
1113122111.content:
A loud cracking woke Sweetie Bell from her sleep, her eyes snapping open as her plot hit the floor. Her entire bed lay in pieces as her growing body ground it into the floor. "What's happening?!" She squeaked, still half asleep. As her head bonked against her bedroom wall, she got to her hooves. Standing straight up her horn almost hit the top of her doorframe. "I'm growing?! That spell must have worked after all." Her growth surged, sending Sweetie Bell shooting up to six feet tall, and embedding her horn in the wall.

"I have to get out of here. I'll wreck the boutique at this rate!" And Sweetie knew that, no matter how big she grew, Rarity would make her regret damaging her studio. Opening her door as quietly as she could, the growing foal made her way down the hallway, passing Rarity's room. Hearing the soft mutters her sister spoke in slumber, Sweetie moved on.

Letting out a relieved breath as she got to the stairs, Sweetie put one hoof, then another on the creaking wooden steps. Making her way down, she hoped her growth waited until she could get to Twilight and help before going crazy.
1113122111.title: Woke up

1113122112.content:
With every breath Sweetie's growth gained speed, her size quickly passing that of a mare until she was as large as Princess Celestia. And Sweetie kept dreaming, her even breaths getting deeper each time. Her hooves began pushing her toys across the floor, piling them up against her dresser. Her bed finally gave with a resigning crack, depositing the growing filly's belly and plot onto the floor. As her limbs reached walls she began to curl up, her body quickly becoming the largest thing in the room. Her horn tore a gash along the wall until it lodged in the corner by her door.

And still Sweetie slept. Her body would have been twenty feet had she stood up, but instead curled like a butterfly in its cocoon. Said cocoon was cracking however, the filly's growing plot and back pushing against the barriers to its expansion. First to break out here her back hooves, crunching through her door into the hallway. Next her butt shattered a window, letting the cool night air in.

As her growth continued to pick up speed, Sweetie...
1113122112.title: Slept through outgrowing her room

111312212.content: Is sweetie bell growing fast or slow?
111312212.title: She was growing!

choices: Sweetie Belle and the ever grow mushroom- here come growth spurts-
Sweetie Belle and the bigger berries
Sweetie Belle and the cursed spring of enlargement
11131222.content: What unwise snack in the woods?
11131222.title: Unwise snack

111312222.content:
Sweetie Belle groaned as she made her way through the Whitetail Woods. "Oh why did I skip lunch?" She asked herself. The Crusaders had decided to try and find their cutie marks in foraging, but so far all Sweetie had found was total boredom and an empty stomach. She was sure anypony in Whitetail could hear her belly, but just as she was about to turn back and admit that she sucked at foraging her nose caught a whiff of something sweet up ahead. Pushing through a thick curtain of leaves, the young unicorn saw a bush thick heavy with bright blue berries. "YES! Foraging cutie mark here I come!"

Practically inhaling the juicy fruit, Sweetie lay on the warm ground, at last satisfied. Her full belly, however, soon rumbled again as, unknown to the filly, the berries she had found were filled with a colony of magical bacteria that were now feeding off of her body's mana. Slowly the virus focused in a single part of her body, ready to expand its host whenever she...
111312222.title: Sweetie Belle and the bigger berries

11131232.content: Maybe the honorary filly Babs Seed?
11131232.title: Somepony else.

11133.content: what about the apple family?
11133.title: Other

111331.content: Which Apple gets a boost?
111331.title: Yep?

1113322.content: How about the younger brother of Thunderlane?
1113322.title: Rumble?

11221.content:
Spike watched eagerly as the gemstone he'd dug up on his latest trip with Rarity glowed in his hand. It was almost the size of his head and Rarity had insisted he take it as it 'would only work on a dress in Yakyakistan.' And sadly her business had yet to spread to the Frozen North. Twilight had said the gem had a magical signature she'd never seen before and that she'd examine it as soon as she returned from Canterlot.

Spike's stomach on the other hand, let its opinion be known with a loud rumble. "Come on, she'll be back soon," he frowned, but the only response he got was a louder growl from his belly. "Well, maybe just one bite wouldn't hurt." With a flash of his fangs, a tiny claw sized piece was cut from the gem. "Oh wow, this is good!" He exclaimed. The flavor of the gem was ten times more intense than anything he'd ever tasted before, and he wiped away a bit of drool. "One more bite."

That one bite though, turned into another, and another, and before Spike knew it the gem was gone. "Oh boy," he lay back, his scaly belly bulging. "Twilight's not gonna be happy," he thought as he closed his eyes and fell asleep. Inside his body, the gem's magic mixed with the draconic natural energy already there and...
11221.title: SPIKEZILLA!

11222.content: How about a gigantic griffon?
11222.title: Gilda?

113.content:
The Ever popular Cutie Mark Crusaders?

Or maybe some or all of the Mane 6?
113.title: Multiple Ponies

1131.content:
"All right, hoof me the blue powder," Apple Bloom said as she stared at the bubbling cauldron in front of her. The Crusaders' clubhouse was filled with the smell of various chemicals and other ingredients. Since she'd started taking lessons from Zecora, the earth pony's abilities had grown by leaps and bounds. Today she was trying her first non-supervised potion.

"You sure this is gonna work?" Scootaloo asked as she passed a dish filled with a glittering blue powder.

"Positive; the book said this potion is sure to 'send the drinker up through the clouds'. Y'all will be flyin' with Rainbow Dash in no time."

"How much longer is this going to take? Rarity's expecting me back at the boutique soon," Sweetie Belle said.

"Just a few more minutes. The liquid had ta turn bright orange, then it'll be ready," Apple Bloom promised. "Now, the book says to add one tablespoon every ten heartbeats." Carefully tipping her hoof, she sent a small amount of the powder into the bubbling brew. A puff of smoke rose up, filling the air with a spicy scent. Slowly the dish emptied until the potion at last turned the desired color.

"Finally, let's do this!" Scootaloo grinned, leaning in and drinking down several mouthfuls of the potion before lunging back and panting. "Hot, hot, hot!"

"Well it IS over a fire," Sweetie giggled. "Just drink some water, you'll be fine."

While Scootaloo downed several glasses of ice water, Apple Bloom ladled the potion into two large bowls. Once it stopped steaming she handed one to Sweetie and took the third for herself. "Cutie Mark Crusaders fliers!" She toasted, downing her bowl quickly while Sweetie sipped hers. "Anypony feel any different?"
1131.title: Growing Crusaders (Before Marks)

11311.content:
"My wings feel all tingly," Scootaloo said, extending her small feathered limbs. Before her disbelieving eyes they were growing, quickly becoming as large as the other Pegasus foals her age. "My wings! I'll be able to fly now!" She leapt into the air in joy.

"Apple Bloom, was that cauldron always this small?" Sweetie asked. Before she'd thought it was level with her eyes, but now she could see clearly down to the bottom.

"Huh? Whadya..." Apple Bloom trailed off as she saw Sweetie Belle growing, her chest rising above the cauldron. Scootaloo meanwhile had landed beside Sweetie and was the same size as her. "Girls, y'all are growin!"

"So are you!" Sweetie pointed out. Surely enough Apple Bloom saw the roof of the clubhouse getting closer each second. Her rump sent the cauldron rolling as she passed six feet tall.

"Guess this is what the potion meant by 'up through the clouds," AB said.

"How big do you think we'll grow?" Scootaloo asked as her wings hit both walls of the clubhouse.
11311.title: Yes *Fast growth*

113112.content:
"The book didn't give a number, but hopefully not too much bigger," Apple Bloom said, hearing the floor groan under the weight of three growing fillies.

"Maybe we should get out of here," Sweetie suggested as her tail broke through one of the windows.

"I think it's a little late for that," Scootaloo said as her hear hit the roof, followed by Bloom and Sweetie. The door would never let them through, and seconds later it was decided for them as three heads emerged into the light as the roof shattered. "New skylight," she laughed.

"An' after all the hard work I put into it!" Apple Bloom sniffled as the growing fillies grew out through the walls, sending them tumbling down to the ground. They were at least thirty feet tall and still growing.

"This is so cool!" Scootaloo grinned as she hovered. "Just wait until Rainbow Dash sees that I'm REALLY her biggest fan now."

"I really hope this stops soon," Sweetie Belle said as her head topped the nearby apple trees. "Rarity isn't gonna like this."

"What's she gonna do?" Scootaloo asked. "You're so big she couldn't move you an inch, and good luck grounding a filly as big as you."

"I think we're slowin' down," Apple Bloom said. Sure enough, the growth finally petered out, leaving the Cutie Mark Crusaders at fifty feet tall. "Guess we ain't little ponies no more."

"But now what do we do?" Sweetie asked.
113112.title: So long clubhouse

1131121.content:
Apple Bloom's stomach chose that moment to let out a rumble which shook the ground. "Hehe, guess we better find some food," she blushed.

"Well there IS food all around us," Scootaloo said as she took a bite of an apple tree. Her teeth sheared through bark and branches easily, and she smiled as she chewed and swallowed. "The wood tastes pretty good actually."

"Hey, those are mah family's trees Scoots! Ya can't just eat 'em like that."

"I'm hungry, and at this size what are they gonna do?" Scootaloo asked as she took another bite, swallowing down most of the top of the tree. "Just take one bit AB, and tell me it's not the best thing you've ever tasted. Sweetie's got the right idea."

"What?" Apple Boom turned and saw Sweetie swallowing down the last of a tree's roots. "Sweetie, not you too!"

"She's right Apple Bloom, eating a whole tree is amazing. It tastes so good! Just give it a try."

The earth pony's tummy rumbled again. "Well, maybe just one bite," she said. Leaning in, she bit off about half of a tree top and chewed. Immediately flavors exploded in her mouth, only growing more intense as she chewed. "Wow, that's great!" She smiled. "But ma family depends on these trees. If we eat 'em all we could lose the farm."

"You've got a point Apple Bloom," Sweetie said. "How about we finish the trees we're eating, and then go somewhere else and look for food?"
1131121.title: Hungry Hungry Fillies

11312.content:
"Nothing," Sweetie replied.

"Nada," Scootaloo added. "You sure you made it right Apple Bloom?"

"I did everything the book said. Maybe there was a page missin' or somethin'," Apple Bloom sighed. "Guess it's back to the drawin' board."

"Well I have to get home," Sweetie said. "Rarity needs me to model for her new fashion line for fillies."

"Guess I'll keep workin' on this," Apple Bloom said.

...

Scootaloo slowly made her way towards Ponyville. Her stomach felt queasy since leaving the clubhouse. "Guess Bloom's potion did do something," she laughed to herself.

"Poor little blank flank, having an upset tummy?" Asked a snooty voice as Scoot's nemesis walked out from behind a boulder. "Did you try and get your cutie mark in cooking?" Diamond Tiara asked.

"That should be labeled a threat to society," Silver Spoon added.

"Leave me alone you two, I'm not in the mood," Scootaloo frowned.

"Now why would we do that? You're all alone, none of your loser friends to help you," Diamond smirked. "Just a lone chicken, all by her lonesome."

"Don't call me that!" Scoots shouted.

"Chicken," Diamond repeated. "You should just accept you'll never get your cutie mark. You're going to be a loser for the rest of your life."

"Just leave me alone!" Scootaloo tried to get around the two Earth Ponies, but Diamond pushed her back. "Let me through!"

"I don't think so," Silver Spoon grinned. "It's time to have some fun."

Scootaloo's stomach was roiling, and a strange tingling sensation shot down her neck to her hooves. As the two bullies came forward...
11312.title: Nothing yet *Slow Growth*

113121.content:
"I said Leave. Me. ALONE!!" Scootaloo yelled as she starts to grow bigger.

Diamond Tiara and Silver Spoon were in shock to see her grow bigger than them. She grows until she's about
113121.title: She starts to grow

113122.content:
Scootaloo lunged forward, her mouth growing wide as she enveloped Silver Spoon's head. Immediately a surge of pleasure rushed through her body. The fur of Silver's face was the most delicious thing she had ever tasted. She swallowed, and Silver Spoon's neck entered her mouth. Her hooves beat against the pegasus' chest, but Scootaloo merely swallowed again, and this time her maw doubled in size as Silver's chest and front legs passed her lips.

Diamond Tiara fell back in horror as she watched her friend being consumed by the blank flank. "Hey, let her go!" She demanded. "You do not eat ponies better than you!"

Scootaloo smirked around her dissented jaw at the terror in Diamond's eyes. She swallowed, bringing Silver Spoon's stomach into her mouth. Her head was in Scoot's stomach now, and the vibrations from her screams started a heat building in Scootaloo's loins. She ran her tongue over Silver's vagina, savoring the sweet flavor before taking her rump in her mouth, leaving only her tail twitching in the air. She slurped it down like a long noodle, leaving her huge gut to descend to the ground. "You were saying something?" She grinned.

Diamond Tiara couldn't believe what she had just seen. Silver Spoon, her best friend had just been eaten by a stupid blank flank. "You give her back right now!" She screamed. "Or my Daddy will make sure you never see the light of day again!"

"You think I'm scared of you anymore?" Scootaloo laughed. "Well I'm not!" Her massive stomach began growing hotter and loud gurgling noises came out as the bulge there rapidly began shrinking. As it did Scootaloo started to grow as her meal was added to herself. By the time her stomach was smooth again Scootaloo had doubled in height, and in a flash of light a silver spoon appeared on each of her flanks. "Huh, looks like I got my cutie mark after all."

Diamond Tiara turned and ran, but with her longer legs Scootaloo quickly caught up with her. A hard shove sent her tumbling to the ground. A smirking pegasus stood over Diamond, a bit of drool hanging from her lips. "Please, don't eat me! I'm sorry!" She begged.

"No you're not. You've just saying that cause I'm bigger than you now," Scootaloo said. "I wonder how you'll taste."

Diamond righted herself and tried to run again, but Scootaloo stood on her tail. Letting it up cause Diamond to trip into a mud puddle which filled her mouth. Scoots leaned down and sucked up the pink earth pony's tail, dragging her off the road and into the bushes. Diamond tried to scream, but the dirt and mud in her mouth muffled the sounds. Scootaloo's next swallow took in her back legs and rump. She ran her tongue over Diamond's crotch, enjoying the taste for a minute before swallowing her stomach and chest. Her front legs beat against the lips holding her, but Scootaloo simply giggled as she sucked down the last of Diamond Tiara. Her signature head gear fell to the ground as Scootaloo felt her gut begin digesting its meal. As she reached seven feet tall she saw a tiara flash into being on her flanks, both marks now half the size they were on their previous owners.

"This is so awesome!" Scootaloo shouted. A part of her wanted to feel bad for the two ponies she had just turned into food, but the sensation of growth overpowered everything else. "I wonder if the others are growing yet. I should see, or maybe find more snacks."
113122.title: She eats them

1131221.content:
Retracing her steps, Scootaloo made her way toward the path Ponyville. If her friends were in the same state as she was, chances were they'd eaten ponies too. "CMC pony eaters," she whispered to herself. A tingle of pleasure ran down her spine as she imagined herself and her friends, all towering over the town as everything became food for them...

A tree to her snout snapped Scoots out of her trance. Rubbing her sore nose, she saw she'd veered off her intended path and ended up in Whitetail Woods. "Wow, I was really out of it," she giggled.

"I'll say," came a voice from her left. Turning she saw Apple Bloom standing behind some bushes, as tall as Scootaloo and with a big grin on her face. "So ya ate Silver a Diamond huh?" She asked, pointing to Scoot's flank.

"Yeah, they were making fun of me, so I made them PART of me," the Pegasus laughed. Looking at Apple Bloom's flank she saw a pair of cutie marks; a snail and a pair of scissors. "Spips and Snails huh?"

"Yep, caught 'em lookin' for stuff in the woods and just gobbled 'em up," Bloom smiled.

"Have you see Sweetie?"

"I'm over here," the unicorn filly said as she walked into view. The other Crusaders looked up at their friend. Sweetie Belle was over fifteen feet tall, her horn running into branches with every step. A trio of different flowers adorned her flank. "Guess who I ran into? The flower mares were all taking a nap in a clearing. I was quiet and just ate all three of them. They never even knew I was there."

"Don't you guys think maybe we should stop this? Eating ponies is wrong isn't it?" Scootaloo asked.

"I don't know, it just feels SO good when I grow," Sweetie replied. "And besides, we finally have our cutie marks! But we can get even more, and be good at everything!"

"Good point Sweetie," Apple Bloom said. "Come on Scoots, we got more cutie marks ta get!"

"I guess so," Scoots replied with a smile after thinking for a minute. "So where to now?"
1131221.title: Scoots looks for her friends

11312212.content:
"Let's go to the park," Sweetie Belle suggested. "We can hide in the trees while we find more ponies. Then when we're big enough we go into Ponyville."

"Sounds good to me," Scoots smiled. The three massive fillies detoured around the edges of the town, keeping behind the gentle hills to stay out of sight. Soon the thick stands of trees and glimmering ponds of Ponyville Park came into view. Slowing to a careful walk, the Crusaders passed the outer ring of trees. Sweetie's horn snagged on several branches, and she used her magic to part them. Ears swiveled as voices came from up ahead. Near a pond two mares were swimming, both earth ponies. A picnic basket lay on the ground near the edge.

Scootaloo stalked behind a cluster of berry bushes until she was a few feet from the water. Tensing her wings, she leapt into the air, mouth wide open. Coming down on top of her prey, she swallowed the mare's head and neck instantly. Once again the incredible taste of a pony filled her mouth. Gulping again, she swallowed the struggling mare's chest and forelegs. She watched the other mare desperately swim for shore, only to be grabbed up by Apple Bloom. The red maned filly tossed the green coated mare up and simply let gravity force her down a hungry throat.

Scoots gulped down the rest of her prey in seconds, sucking her wet tail down like a noodle. Paddling to shore, she lay beside Apple Bloom as their bellies digested their prey. Both fillies moaned as they grew, their height going up to twelve feet. "We're almost as big as you Sweetie," the Pegasus said as a sliced lime flashed onto her flank, while Apple Bloom now sported a trowel.

Moving on, the fillies half crawled along until they came upon a half dozen ponies in one of the small clearings. A unicorn was tossing Frisbees with his magic to a pair of pegasi in the air, while three earth ponies were setting up a tent. "We can't get them all at once," Scoots said.

"We'll have to move fast," Sweetie said. "Scoots, you go after the pegasi. If one gets away that's ok, we were gonna show ourselves soon anyway. Apple Bloom, you and me charge in from two sides and eat as many as we can. If more ponies show up and try to stop us..."

"They'll just end up addin' to us," Bloom grinned.

The three fillies broke up, Scoots launching herself into the air at the flying ponies. The sight of the twelve foot filly stunned the two ponies long enough for her to slam into one with her wing, sending her tumbling to the ground while the other was enveloped by the filly's maw. Gulping rapidly, she swallowed her victim down in only a few moments. Before digestion could begin she hurled herself downwards towards where the other pegasus was struggling to her hooves. Opening her mouth as wide as she could, Scoots simply shoved the mare down her throat instantly. Moaning as two ponies struggled in her belly, she saw Sweetie gulp down the unicorn, her throat rippling as she hums in bliss. Apple Bloom had two ponies in hoof holds while the third vanished down her gullet.

Another minute and the clearing was empty, the Crusaders bodies growing until they each stood at twenty feet tall.

"Wow, we're huge!" Scootaloo smiled. Her flank glimmered with her new cutie marks, the other fillies flanks likewise glowing.

"Ah'd say we're big enough for a little trip into town," Sweetie grinned.

The Crusaders high hoofed, and then....
11312212.title: The park

choices: 30 Feet in height and slowly growing
Over 70 Feet and rapidly getting larger
113122121.content:
As the now 20 foot(hooves and long bird like wings included) Crusaders continued their playful but destructive rampage across the countryside,Bloom looked out into the distance and saw:

"Hey guys look a nearby town! I'd say there's a lot more cute little meals to be tried out in there!"

"Yeah! Let's pay them a little visit and have a bit of fun!" Screamed Sweetie with a particular gleam in her eyes as all three giggled cutely and began flying at a steady pace towards the unsuspecting city.

The regular sized ponies and other mythic creatures that inhabited this town had no idea the fate that was about to befall them but as soon as the normally sunny sky grew dark,all of the citizens looked up confused into the sky expecting to see dark storm of rain clouds instead there appeared three individual huge shadows and loud thunderous like laughter filled the air causing the ground to shake.

"Wh...what's going on?" Cried out one citizen but before anyone else could answer there was another massive earth quake as all three enormous Crusaders landed and stared around their now tiny surroundings.

"Cool! Look how big we are compared to everything else and I bet we can get a lot bigger if we have a few more snacks!" Apple Sweetie exclaimed merrily as soon as the tiny citizens heard this,they began panicking,running back to their houses to hide behind locked doors or just running around in circles as one might expect terrified citizens to do during such times but with one quick swipe from her left hoof Scootaloo grabbed hold of the nearest one dangling him over her opening mouth with him panicking and squirming around like crazy.

"No..no not me please!" He begged frantically.

"Sorry but you look so tasty sooooo...." As she dropped him straight into her mouth and swallowed instantly.

Those who saw this panicked even further trying their best to hide,to plead for their lives not to be stomped or eaten but fortunately the now gigantic fillies had no interest whatsoever in stepping on anyone they were just incredibly famished and wanted to see how BIG they could get with each meal.

"Ahhhhh RUN! THEY'S ATTACKING OUR TOWN!!" Another citizen cried as there was absolutely nothing anyone could do one by one the three massive ponies gulped,slurped and practically tossed down each and every single individual into their mouths sending gem a one way no return trip into their stomachs without a thought of hesitation until there was hardly anyone else in the entire town.

" Well that was certainly fun don't you think?" Bloom giggled. "But oh my there's no one else around for miles and we still look the size as before!"

" You're right maybe if we find a couple more people,we can grow to a even bigger height than mere twenty feet!" Scootaloo said thoughtfully as she prepared to trot away but before they could even set a single hoof on Th ground there was a burst of light and they all cried out in unison.

"Whoa...hey what's going on?" As soon as the light cleared all three were amazed that they were now........
113122121.title: They head into town

1131222.content:
The gurgling from Scootaloo's stomach decided for her. "I gotta find more food, and fast." Setting off on hoof, she circled around the edge of Ponyville. She knew she couldn't be discovered yet, not until she was big enough to get away if she was spotted. She watched ponies moving around, looking for somepony alone.

"Come one, let me find something!" Scoots said in frustration. She kept in the bushes until she came to a building which could be her next feast. She smiled as she walked up to...
1131222.title: She needs more pony food

11312222.content:
The Ponyville park was always filled with ponies having fun, and more importantly had enough cover for a seven foot filly to move around unnoticed. Scootaloo walked to the center of the park, where trees and carefully tended bushes and shrubs formed spots for picnics and romantic encounters. A unicorn stallion was setting up a picnic blanket with his magic, his back to her. Tensing her wings, Scootaloo shot from the bushes and slammed her prey into the ground. He yelped as the air was driven from his lungs. Before he could recover she swallowed his head, his horn scraping the roof of her mouth. Once again a surge of pleasure filled her mind as she gulped down his neck and chest. His kicking forelegs slid down easily, surprising Scoots with how strong her own legs were.

She quickly swallowed down the rest of the stallion, her stomach already preparing for digestion. She tossed the picnic basket in after him, seeing no sense in letting it go to waste. The familiar heat filled her as her stomach began shrinking and the mark of a puzzle appeared on her flank. She moaned as she grew to ten feet tall, a small puddle of juices pooling under her. "Oh man, that was the best growth yet!" She grinned. A part of her knew it was wrong to eat ponies like this, but the voice was growing quieter with each meal.

As her stomach returned to normal size, Scootaloo...
11312222.title: Ponyville Park

choices: The finds the other CMC who have grown
113122222.content:
Felt an intense pressure on her forehead. "Ouch, what the hay?!" Reaching up with a hoof she gasped as she felt a short pointy object protruding from her skull. "A horn? How?!" She wondered. "From that stallion I ate? Wait, that means..." Closing her eyes, she focused on her hooves, and seconds later she felt the life force from the grass beneath her. "I must have picked that up from Silver and Diamond. I'm an Alicorn now!"

The ten foot filly jumped for joy, then a wicked smile crossed her face. "Now it's time for some real fun."
113122222.title: Grows a horn

1132.content: How will the Mane 6 ponies grow?
1132.title: Mane 6 Ponies

1133.content: How about Silver Spoon and Diamond Tiara?
1133.title: More Ponies

11332.content: How about some of these?
11332.title: Show me more ponies!

113322.content:
"Pinkie Pie, we need you to watch the store for a few hours," Mr. Cake shouted as he and his wife frantically gathered receipts and packages. "There was a mix-up at the train station and they sent a package that was supposed to go to Canterlot."

"No problemo Mr. Cake," Pinkie smiled. "Responsibility IS my middle name after all."

"Thanks, be back soon," Mrs. Cake said as the couple rushed out the door.

Pound and Pumpkin came bounding down the stairs when they heard the door slam. "No worries, they'll be right back," Pinkie told the foals. "I wonder what got delivered. One little peak can't hurt." Hopping over to the crate in the middle of the room, she carefully pried the top open. Inside the crate was packed with a glittering white powder. "Looks like sugar."

"Sugar!" Pound Cake smiled, jumping on Pinkie's back before bouncing up and towards the crate.

"Oh no you don't," Pinkie grinned as she caught him. "No diving into things that might be sugar. We could be wrecking somepony's cookie mix."

As Pinkie placed Pound on her back, Pumpkin stealthily levitated herself up and into the crate. "Sugar!" She giggled.

"Oh no!" Pinkie said as she raced over to grab the little unicorn, but as she did Pound took the opportunity to leap into the powder from her back. "Double oh no!" The foals sent up little clouds of powder as they played around, and Pumpkin's horn glowed as she tried to levitate herself again, but instead the powder glowed the same color and the crate exploded.

By the time the cloud of powder settled Pinkie saw the foals playing on a somehow clean floor. "Where'd it all go?" She wondered. "You two all right?" The foals giggled as they rolled around and Pinkie wiped her brow. "Whew, you had me worried for a sec there. Oh no, what if whoever that was going to still wants it? I gotta tell Twilight! Don't you two move; I'll be right back!" Pinkie raced upstairs to get the magical letter Twilight had given her for emergencies.

As Pinkie left, Pound and Pumpkin started feeling strange. Their whole bodies were tingling, and their stomachs growled with sudden hunger. Pound flew up to a plate of cookies on the counter and started shoveling them into his mouth. Pumpkin phased through the glass and started working her way through the cakes and pastries within. Her mouth opened as wide as Pinkie's as she shoved a whole cake inside.

Soon the whole front of the store was bare of anything edible. The foals lay back, their tummies bulging with their meals, but then the tingling feeling returned and they watched as the bulges shrank and their stomachs were back to normal. The tingling got stronger, and their bodies began to grow. Pound watched happily as his wings grew bigger, their feathers now those of a colt three times his age. Pumpkin felt her horn grow longer and her magic get stronger. Both of their diapers quickly tore apart and fell off.

Bigger and bigger they grew, finally stopping at the size of full grown ponies. "Biggah!" They giggled together. As they stood up their tummies rumbled again. Pound spotted a big of powder still on the sides of the crate and lunged for it. His jaws shattered the wood and the entire crate vanished down his throat. He smiled at being able to eat something he hadn't before. The tingling returned as the colt grew another two feet, but rear breaking the display case Pumpkin had been inside before.

Pinkie came back down the stairs at that very moment. "Ok, letter sent to Twilight, now I just have to AH!" She shouted as her eyes found the two giant foals. "You...you're bigger!"

"Biggah!" The two foals giggled together.

"Hungie," Pound said as they looked around for more to eat, and their eyes settled on....
113322.title: Pound and Pumpkin Cake

choices: The building still standing, for now
The foals growing through the roof
1133222.content:
Everything around them. Pound attacked the display cases, taking huge bites of the wood and glass. Pumpkin began crushing and swallowing the chairs and tables. Both grew slowly as they ate, making each bite larger than the last.

"Hey, stop that! No eating Sugarcube Corner!" Pinkie shouted, but the foals ignored her. Even pulling their tails did nothing. "Come on guys, Mr. and Mrs. Cake are gonna be very angry when the come back and see th-yikes!" She bounced back, just avoiding Pound's jaws. "And especially no eating Pinkie!"

Pound had finished the displays and now started using his hooves to break the walls and shovel them into his mouth. He gigged and moaned as he ate, his colthood emerging from its sheath and snaking across the floor. Pumpkin swallowed the last table and moved on to the storeroom, breaking down the door and starting to devour all the ingredients, both cooked and raw. A trail of juices followed her as she enjoyed the feeling of eating everything she saw.

Pinkie dodged a growing hoof and dashed for the door. "Gotta get Twilight now, before its too late." She dodged Pound's wing and sped down the street towards the library.

...

Twilight Sparkle smiled as she placed another completed checklist in her done pile. "Only twenty more to go," she beamed.

"Yeah, only twenty more," Spike groaned. "I feel a claw cramp coming on."

"Now Spike, the sooner we get the next one started, the sooner we can finish."

Spike reached for another piece of parchment when the door was thrown open with a small and Pinkie Pie came barreling in.

"Twilight, I need your help! The twins won't stop growing!"

"Uh, foals tend to do that Pinkie," Twilight deadpanned.

"Didn't you get my emergency letter?!" Pinkie asked. "You know, the one under your tail!"

"Huh?" Twilight looked behind her and saw the scroll peeking out from under the lavender hairs. "Oh, woops."

"Come on, you need to do something!" Pinkie pushed Twilight forward with her head.

"All right Pinkie, stop shoving," Twilight frowned.

The two ponies quickly made it back to Sugarcube Corner where they saw...
1133222.title: The rest of Sugarcube Corner

11332222.content:
Sugarcube Corner was coming apart from the inside. Two huge heads were bursting through the roof, giggling as they ate the tiles around them. Hooves crashed through walls and in less than a minute the two massive foals had outgrown the building and stood up, each standing thirty feet tall.

"This is impossible! Ponies don't just grow like this!" Twilight shouted. "Please tell me you know how this happened."

"Well, there was this case we got that was supposed to go to Canterlot. It was full of this weird powder, there was a sneeze and..." Pinkie trailed off.

"We have to find out what was in that box."

"Well you'll have to go inside Pound's tummy. He ate it," Pinkie said.

"What about the pony who delivered it? Maybe Mr. and Mrs. Cake know," Twilight theorized.

"Maybe, they were going to the train station. But first we might want to do something about them," Pinkie said, pointing to the foals who were now munching on a tree.

"I'll try," Twilight gritted her teeth and fired a massive pulse of magic from her horn which centered around Pound and Pumpkin's legs, immobilizing them. "That won't hold them for long, come on!" Twilight said, setting off at a full gallop with Pinkie bouncing along beside her.
11332222.title: The foals growing through the roof

113323.content: Tough crowd! How about some of these?
113323.title: Next Choices!

1133231.content:
Snips slowly make his way into Whitetail Wood, looking around for his best friend. "Snails, where are you!" He shouted.

"Over here," came a droning reply as a lanky orange unicorn appeared from behind a clump of bushes. "I just found the greatest thing ever!"

"The Great and Powerful Trixie's magic tome?" Snips guessed.

"Nope, even better," Snails smiled. His horn glowed as a large purplish mushroom levitated next to him.

"A mushroom? I have plenty of those at my house," Snips frowned.

"These ones are special," Snails grinned. "They can make you bigger!" Striding up to his friend, Snips saw that Snails actually was almost three inches taller than the last time he'd seen him.

"No way! You're really bigger!" Snips exclaimed. "How many of those things did you eat?"

"Just the one, but that's all you need cause they keep working even after you eat 'em," Snails explained.

"Gimme!" Snips snapped, taking the mushroom in his own aura and gulping it down. Several seconds passed with nothing happening. "Snails! I'm still the same size!"

"Oh yeah, I forgot," Snails drawled. "To grow, you gotta do this," he said as he....
1133231.title: Snips and Snails

11332312.content:
Sitting down, Snails began rubbing his forehoof over the winkled skin of his sheath. Quickly the head of his cock emerged, inch after inch of his shaft following.

"Snails, I don't wanna watch this!" Snips frowned. "Go behind a bush or something if you wanna get off."

"You mean you don't wanna watch me grow?" Snails asked as he felt a familiar tingle fill his body as he slowly began to grow.

Snips watched, his earlier embarrassment forgotten as he watched his friend gain an inch, then two in height. His tail lashed from side to side in pleasure as his penis became fully erect, pulsing with every inch gained.

"Come on, you wanna grow too don't ya?" Snails asked with a grin.

"Oh, right!" Snips said as he planted his plot and rubbed his own sheath. His hoof soon felt the flat head of his dick as it came out. Rubbing more quickly, he felt a strong tingle as his chubby body started to expand. He watched with wide eyes, hooves still pumping as his legs pushed soil ahead of them and his rump spread over the ground. "Wow, this feels amazing!" He gasped as he grew another inch.

"Yeah, I wonder how big we can get," Snails replied.

The two colts kept rubbing side by side, growing by an inch every minute. Pre leaked down their shafts and pooled between their growing balls. Finally the pair came, thick ropes of cum painting the trunk of a tree as Snails his five feet in height, Snips only a few inches below him. Basking in the afterglow, the colts turned to each other and...
11332312.title: Started rubbing his sheath

113323122.content:
"Hey, is somepony there?" Came a call before the two unicorns could speak.

"Somepony heard us, what'll they think if they see us big like this?!" Snips hissed.

"That they wanna grow too?" Snails replied.

"Huh, yeah maybe," Snips grinned as between the trees appeared...
113323122.title: Somepony finds them

choices: Stay and grow with Snips and Snails
1133231222.content:
The propeller beanie of Button Mash came into view first, followed by its owner. "Hey guys," the earth pony colt smiled. "Didn't know anypony else was out here. What're you doin' in the woods?"

"You really wanna know?" Snips smirked. "It's super cool, but you gotta keep it a secret."

"Yeah, till everypony sees," Snails added, getting a glare from Snips.

"I promise!" Button nodded, catching sight of the white coated tree. "Uh, maybe I should just go..."

"No, you gotta eat this first." Snails levitated over a mushroom. "Don't ya see we're bigger?"

"Bigger?" Button asked as he looked at the two unicorns. "Hey yeah, you really are. You two have a growth spurt?"

"Yeah, we can grow whenever we want if we just make ourselves feel good," Snips said. "Just eat the mushroom as you can grow too."

"Think of it like a video game, but you're the main character," Snails suggested.

Button suddenly broke out into a huge grin. "Like Attack of the MegaPonies?! That'd be awesome!" Lunging forward, he chomped down the mushroom in one big bite. "I don't feel anything."

"Like Snails said, you gotta rub yourself," Snips nodded.

"Oh yeah," Button replied, blushing. "Maybe I should go home first."

"You wanna grow out of your house?" Snails grinned. "That'd be cool. Or you could stay and grow with us, then we all go into town once we're big enough."

Button frowned as he thought, before deciding....
1133231222.title: Button Mash

12.content: Does the story begin during the movies, or perhaps before or after?
12.title: Equestria Girls

121.content:
A few ideas.

A) Sunset Shimmer acquires the power to grow by absorbing the energy of others when she tries to regain the use of her magic after arriving in the human world. Either after stealing the element of magic or after when she first arrives through the portal.

B) When Princess Twilight chases Sunset through the portal, her alicorn magic reacts to her new body by growing for some reason. Perhaps a reason Sunset tries to discover and use for herself?

Or

C) The element blast that cleanses Sunset of her darkness has a secondary effect on one or more students at Canterlot High. A growing effect.
121.title: Equestria Girls

1211.content: So, when does this happened? During her first trip through the portal or when she put on the crown with the element of magic?
1211.title: Growing Sunset

1213.content:
As the glow from Princess Twilight's departure for Equestria faded away, the crowd started to break up. Sunset and her group of 'friends' left for the parking lot, not noticing the wisps of magic which began swirling at the bottom of the crater where Sunset's demon self had met her end. Fleeing from the magic that had separated it from its host, the red and silver energy moved along the ground.

Moving along the darkened streets, the magic entered the residential districts, finally entering...
1213.title: Spreading the magic

12131.content:
The magic darted through a set of massive double doors, slithering up a flight of stairs lit only by beams of moonlight. Stopping at each door lining the long hall, the glittering stream finally halted at the door at the end of the corridor. A dim light shone from under the bottom of the silver and purple door.

Passing under the small opening, the magic slowly came up to the massive bed resting in one corner of the room, upon which two girls slept, the remains of a board game resting to one side of the girl with loose purple and white hair. Neither girl stood as the stream of magic separated into two tendrils, one red and one silver. Each one spread out and encompassed a girl, slowly absorbing into their bodies. The glow from the magic faded as each girl twitched several times as the magic merged with them.

Each girl's breathing sped up slightly, their arms and legs ruffling the sheets as...
12131.title: Mansion (Silver Spoon/Diamond Tiara)

121311.content:
Diamond Tiara woke as a powerful shudder ran from her neck to her toes. Her entire body felt like she'd just recovered from the worst case of pins and needles ever. Beside her Silver Spoon groaned as she sat up. "Why do I feel like I just touched a balloon Pinkie Pie rubbed across a carpet?" The grey skinned girl asked.

"I don't know," Diamond replied. "I just woke up feeling the same thing."

"You don't think Pinkie snuck in here to prank us do you?" It wouldn't have been the first time the party obsessed freshman had done something along those lines.

"No, there'd be confetti," Diamond said with certainty.

"Good point," Silver nodded, before she twitched again, her shoulders rising and falling like wings. "Felt like I just got a shock," she said.

Before Diamond Tiara could reply she felt her muscles go haywire, a powerful heat growing in her chest. "This isn't normal!" She hissed.

"I'll say..."Silver Spoon trailed off as she felt something new. Her legs felt like invisible hands were rubbing them, and he stomach and back itched. Looking to he friend, the words she'd been about to speak vanishing from her mind. "Diamond...look at your legs," she whispered.

"My legs, what about..." Diamond trailed off as she saw to he disbelieving eyes, her covered feet moving very slowly down the bed, without any movement from the rest of her body. A quick glance showed the rest of her body growing as well, barely visible but unmistakably. "Ok, we're still asleep," she said loudly. "OUCH!" Followed as Silver Spoon pinched her arm.

"Guess not," Silver Spoon said, looking down to confirm that she was growing as well. The growth was slow, at best half an inch a minute as the two girls sat speechless. "How is this happening?!"

"I don't know, maybe some of that freaky stuff from the end of the Fall Formal," Diamond guessed. "Uh, Silver. Could you just answer me one thing." She asked hesitantly.

"What's that?" Silver asked as her height rose by its first whole inch.

"Are our cloths growing with us?"
121311.title: They woke up

choices: A sudden growth spurt during the night and wet dreams
1213111.content:
(Sorry for writing in this format. I am very tired.)

Diamond and Silver frantically ran their hands over their bodies checking themselves, and simultaneously sighed in relief in finding that their clothes hadn't tightened or ripped at all during their sudden growth in height.

Silver wiped at her brow. "Phew, I guess we don't have to worry about running around butt naked for the time being. Boy, that would be embarrassing! So I guess we can rule out sudden onset puberty as the cause, huh?"

D: " It looks like it. Guess I won't have to shop around for a new designer dress that'll fit."
She laughed nervously. "Hey Sil..."

SS: "Yeah, Di?"

D: "This feels kind of weird, doesn't it? I know I should be freaking out right now but it doesn't really bother me all that much."

SS:"I know what you mean, and I feel the same way, kind of. That's probably just the adrenaline talking, though. You might be about ready to wet your pants when the real growth kicks in,"

D: "Speaking of growth, how big do you think we're going to get? Sunset was like twelve feet tall when she transformed into that demon thing. You don't think anything like that could happen to us, could it?"

SS:"I do know one thing. Diamond, we can't end up being like Sunset. No matter what happens, how big we get, we have to stay true to our morals. We can't go around bullying people for our own pleasure, like she does. Do you understand?"

D:"Yeah, I get it. I promise I won't be bad."

SS: "Me too. If nothing else that's something we can hold on to. So, what do we do now? What CAN we do? The portal is closed now and it's not supposed to open again for another 2 years. Do you think we could even hold out until then? I don't want to go to my junior prom as some gigantic awkward weirdo that no one wants to go out with."

D:"There's no use worrying about it now. We should get some sleep so we're well rested and can tackle this problem head on."

SS: "Alright, Diamond, I'll see you in the morning I guess."

D: " Goodnight. Silver, sweet dreams"
1213111.title: They were

1213112.content:
Silver looked down at her pajama top, watching as more of her arm became visible. The cuff was slowly but surely tightening around her wrist. Further down she could feel the straps of her bra digging the slightest bit into the flesh of her shoulders. "Afraid not," she smiled sheepishly. As another inch was added to her height she suddenly realized that her vision, normally a bit blurry without her glasses, was crystal clear. "But whatever's happening, it just fixed my eyes!"

"I'm more concerned with how big we're going to get than your eyes right now Silver Spoon!" Diamond frowned. "I don't wanna be a freak like that Sunset Shimmer turned into!" Her shoulders started shaking as she pictured herself fifty feet tall, everyone running from her as she begged for help.

"Hey, that's not going to happen," Silver Spoon wrapped her arms around her friend. "We're not changing into flame haired demons, and besides, I'm right here with you. No matter what happens, I'm not leaving your side."

"Thanks Silver," the pale purple girl leaned into the hug, blushing a bit as she felt Silver Spoon's growing breasts press against her own. "Even when we're both growing yours are still bigger."

Silver Spoon giggled. "Hey, maybe you'll catch up. We should see if we can control this. Sunset could direct what her magic did, maybe we can too."

"Ok, I'll try." Closing her eyes, Diamond tried to feel whatever was inside her and making her grow. The tingling from before came back, and she felt it across her whole body. It felt like thousands of tiny soap bubbles were popping under her skin. She imagined them stopping along with her growth. For a moment the popping sensation did stop, but almost instantly a pressure started building under her skin.

"It worked Diamond, you're not growing anymore," Silver smiled.

"Yeah, but it feels worse now. Hurts," Diamond gritted her teeth as the pressure built more and more, until it felt like her skin was going to pop. "GAH!" She cried as she stopped fighting it, and just like that the pressure was gone as her growth started again. "I tried, but that's as much as I could fight it."

"Hey, at least we know we CAN stop growing, even if not for very long. Now we just have to find a way to deal with what you felt, like directing the magic or whatever's inside us out without growing."

By now both girls had grown three whole inches. Their pajamas were tightening ever faster, pressed against growing skin. Silver Spoon winced as her bra was pressed uncomfortably against her growing chest. Her calves were also pushing her pajama pants up her legs. Throwing the covers off, she adjusted her legs so they were straight out and watched them pass one crease after another.

"If we can't stop growing, we need to get out of the house," Diamond said. "I'm NOT going to wreck my home because of this, even if I can never fit in it again."

"Yeah, good plan," Silver Spoon nodded. "But if we keep growing this slowly we've got some time before we have to do that, and I want to keep trying to find a way to stop this." Another wince as her bra straps dug into her shoulders and back. "But first I have to do one thing." Reaching with difficulty under her almost skin tight shirt. she undid the clasp of her bra. "Ahhh," she sighed in relief as the stinging faded and her boobs bobbed as their support went away.

Diamond Tiara blushed as she watched her friend chuck her blue bra to the floor. Her own only barely pressed against her own chest, for now at least. By now both girls had gained a full six inches in height, and the growth seemed to be accelerating. "Let's go to the backyard. Between the garden wall and the pool we'd have to get twenty feet tall or more before anyone could see us."

"Right, and we can keep trying to find ways of stopping this," Silver added.
1213112.title: Clothes don't grow

12131121.content:
With their plan set, the pair nodded at each other, then cautiously crept towards the doorway and peered outside.
No voices or sounds of movement could be heard: the house was dead quiet.
Satisfied that they weren't going to be disturbed, Diamond Tiara turned to SIlver and whispered, "Looks like the coast is clear. The staff will have all went home, so we shouldn't run into anyone on the way there. We can slip out the sliding glass door in the kitchen and then it's a straight shot to the pool. Dad just had a privacy fence installed last week so no one will see us out there... hopefully."
Silver nodded in agreement at first, before her brow furrowed in concern as a sudden thought jumped to the forefront."What about your mom? Doesn't she usually wake up early to work on her aerobics machines?" she whispered back.
Spoiled Rich had recently started on a new health and exercise regimen to slim down after finding out that wouldn't be able to wear one of her new dresses. She of course threw a fit and began investing into buying the best exercise machines and dietary supplements money could buy. If only she knew that her only daughter was steadily increasing in size to the point where she may never be able to fit into anything again.
Upon hearing this Diamond Tiara (quietly) smacked her forehead in frustration. "Oh geeze, I completely forgot about her. She obviously can't see me like this, so if it comes down to it we'll just have to avoid her. The longer we hang around here, the bigger we're going to get, so let's just go."

SIlver, despite her reservations couldn't help but agree with that sentiment, so letting Diamond take the lead, the two tip-toed through the house making sure to make as little noise as possible...
12131121.title: The girls head outside

123.content:
Awesome, here are some ideas:

1) When Sci-Twi uses her magic draining device on the girls it has another effect on her, a growing effect.

2) In the aftermath of the meeting of Sunset and Midnight Sparkle, one of more of the Mane Seven starts to grow for various reasons.
123.title: Friendship Games

choices: Or instead, The Shadowbolts are somehow affected by the new magic
Or mayhaps, even the background characters are getting affected
1232.content: Before we continue though, it is always best to have an option available if anyone wants to create a new different storyline.
1232.title: Mane Seven MishapsWith Size?

info.brief_description: The characters of MLP and EQG are getting a bit larger than normal
info.description:
Characters from My Little Pony and the Equestria Girls movies begin growing in a variety of ways.

Rules:

1) No ultra rapid growth ie growing 1000ft or more instantly. No limits on final size though

2) No non MLP/EQG characters

Aside from that anything goes. My first interactive. Hopefully it will be good.
info.pretty_title: My Little Pony Growing Is Magic
